primary_product.name: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum
primary_product.how_to_use: Apply 2–3 drops in the morning before sunscreen

competitor_product.name: AquaRepair Hyaluronic Complex
benefits: Strengthens the skin's natural moisture barrier
Reduces the appearance of fine lines and texture
Improves overall skin resilience and plumpness
